game.s_dis: Play Stick RPG Complete unblocked online and live the life of a stick figure in a 2D city. Build stats, earn money, buy houses, and climb the ladder to wealth, power, or infamy.
game.l_dis:
Stick RPG Complete – Life Simulator Flash Classic

Stick RPG Complete is a 2D flash-based life simulator where you play as a stick figure who wakes up in a mysterious city with no memory. The goal? Build your character's stats, earn money, and make choices that define your future.

What is Stick RPG Complete?

Originally released as a flash game, Stick RPG Complete lets you explore a city, attend school to increase intelligence, take on jobs like working at McSticks or corporate offices, buy property, gamble at the casino, or even turn to crime. Your decisions shape your character’s success or downfall.

How to Play Stick RPG Complete?

  • Stats: Increase Strength, Intelligence, and Charm by studying, training, or socializing.
  • Jobs: Start at entry-level work and climb the corporate ladder or join the criminal underworld.
  • Money: Earn through jobs, gambling at the casino, or less-legal means.
  • Choices: Decide whether to pursue wealth, power, or infamy in a sandbox-style city.
  • Time: Play for 15, 40, 100 days, or indefinitely depending on your selected mode.

Why Play Stick RPG Complete Unblocked?

With Stick RPG Complete Unblocked, you can enjoy this classic life simulation game directly in your browser with no restrictions. Build your dream life as a stick figure anytime, anywhere.

Key Features

  • Open-Ended Gameplay: Shape your stick figure’s life as you choose.
  • Multiple Careers: Work fast food, climb the corporate ladder, or go criminal.
  • Stat Building: Train Intelligence, Strength, and Charm to unlock opportunities.
  • Exploration: Visit shops, school, casino, bank, and apartments in the city.
  • Unblocked Play: Experience the full game online without downloads.

Live Your Stick Life!

Will you become a wealthy CEO, a criminal overlord, or a well-rounded citizen? Play Stick RPG Complete unblocked online and decide your stick figure’s destiny.
